pageTitle: Deputy Prime Minister’s itinerary for Friday, May 1, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

11:15 a.m.  The Deputy Prime Minister will join the Prime Minister for a media availability. Minister of Justice and Attorney General of Canada David Lametti, Minister of Public Safety and Emergency Preparedness Bill Blair, and Parliamentary Secretary to the Minister of Public Safety and Emergency Preparedness Joël Lightbound will also be in attendance.

Room 225
West Block
Parliament Hill                   

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 10:45 a.m.
  • Journalists can dial in to listen and ask questions.
  • Participant dial-in numbers:
    Local: 613-960-7527
    Toll-free: 1-888-265-0903
    Pass code: 3418355#
